scenario_text.value: Oh, there you are, Miu.
Wah! T-Takuma?!
Huh?

That’s weird. Why’d Miu go hide behind
Syakomon?

Beats me... Did I do something to make her
upset?

Oh, no, it’s nothing like that. Miu’s just
anxious about talking to you.
Isn’t that right, Miu?

Yeah, well... I was afraid you’d be mad at
me.
Who, me? Why would I be mad at you?
You know, because of what I said before...
You mean how you agreed with the professor?
Yeah... You are mad about that, aren’t you?

(She looks like she’s practically
terrified... Do I really seem that upset?)

(Obviously I’m not mad at Miu, and I want to
reassure her that everything’s fine...)

(...but is she going to believe me if I just
tell her not to worry?)

(What would Kaito do in this situation? Pat
her on the head? He doesn’t seem the type...)
(How should I comfort Miu?)
Smile reassuringly.
Pat her on the head.
Smile reassuringly.

It’s okay, Miu. I’m not mad, and neither is
anyone else.
You mean it?
Yes, I really mean it.
But then...why does your smile look so fake?

(Urk... This is just what I was afraid might
happen.)
Pat her on the head.

(Let’s see, first I should crouch down a bit
so I can look her in the eye, then...)
Uh... Takuma?

It’s okay, Miu. I’m not mad at you. You’ve
got nothing to be afraid of.
Wh-wh-what?! T-T-Takuma, what are you doing?!

Huh? Miu, your face is turning bright red!
Are you okay?!

No! No, I’m not okay! I’ve never felt more
embarrassed! Patting me on the head?!
(Oh no... Was that maybe going too far?)
Um... I’m sorry. I didn’t mean to upset you.

It’s...it’s not that I’m upset, exactly...
You just surprised me, that’s all!

My brother used to do that all the time, you
know.

Well, I just wanted you to know I meant what
I said. Nobody’s mad at you, Miu.
Yeah... I hope not.

Because really, I don’t want to abandon Aoi
if we can help it...
Miu’s really worried about Aoi, you know.
Hey! Why’d you say that, Syakomon?!

It’s okay, I know that. You’re always
thinking about others, Miu.
Yeah, you’re really nice!

I just... I want us all to go home together.
And I’m a little worried about my brother.
Why’s that?

Well, you know how he gets sometimes, and
I think he blames himself for what happened.

(Now I get it. Miu sided with the professor
because she was worried about Kaito.)

Well, don’t worry about that either. I’m
keeping an eye on Kaito too, you know.

Right! Plus, Kaito’s got Dracmon! I’m sure
he’ll be fine!

Yeah... Hearing you two say that does make me
feel better.

Heheh... Well, now that you’ve got nothing
left to worry about, let’s go look for Aoi!

Right! Me and Syakomon will go check by the
mountain!

Me and Syakomon will go check by the
mountain!
